title: Is it normal to for a 'Pixel is starting...' prompt to remain on the screen for hours.
content:
I recently received a replacement for my Google Pixel 2 due to an issue with the charging port. I inserted the SD card from my old phone into the new one and went through all of the start-up procedures. Afterwards I received a text from Verizon to restart my phone. Since then, it has been stalled on 'Pixel is starting...' along with a loading bar. 

I can access settings and wifi, but I have been unable to open any apps or the access the home screen.

I have reset the device several times. There have been no additional notifications with the exception of one SMS message which I have been unable to access.

Please let me know if anything can be done.
